snippet: Readers respond to an article on the debate over whether administering P.S.A. blood tests for prostate cancer is effective or causes unnecessary pain.
lead_paragraph: Readers respond to an article on the debate over whether administering P.S.A. blood tests for prostate cancer is effective or causes unnecessary pain.

headline.main: Should Men Get Prostate Cancer Tests?
headline.print_headline: Should Men Get Prostate Cancer Tests?
